title: for all you complaining about network issues

embed.description: there are several posts within the last 24 hours on the boards in the miscellaneous section talking about being disconnected, only minutes after another person and they state they have seen others disconnect at exactly the same time. body: I posted a thing for you all, not sure if its been fixed yet but oh well, better late than never.
